Title: Valid User Registration
Steps: Prepare a valid request body with all required fields | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status and body
Expected: Response status should be 201 Created, and response should contain userId and authToken

Title: Duplicate Email Registration
Steps: Register a user with a unique email | Attempt to register another user with the same email | Check the response status and body
Expected: Response status should be 409 Conflict, and error message should be 'Email already registered'

Title: Invalid Password Registration
Steps: Prepare a request body with a password that does not meet the criteria (e.g., less than 8 characters) | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status and body
Expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with specific error details about password validation

Title: Invalid Mobile Number Registration
Steps: Prepare a request body with an invalid mobile number format | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status and body
Expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with error details about mobile number validation

Title: Rate Limiting Exceeded
Steps: Simulate 6 registration attempts from the same IP within an hour | Check the response status of the 6th attempt
Expected: Response status should be 429 Too Many Requests
